full_text: Knitted baubles in DROPS Lima. The piece is worked in the round, bottom up, with multi-coloured Nordic pattern. Theme: Christmas. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DROPS Design: Pattern li-172 Yarn group B SIZE : Circumference = 23 cm. Diameter = 7 cm. YARN : DROPS LIMA from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 50 g colour 0100, off white 50 g colour 0705, olive 50 g colour 0707, rust 50 g colour 2923, goldenrod 50 g colour 5610, deep taupe 50 g colour 9021, brick red 50 g colour 9022, blush 50 g colour 9023, maroon 50 g colour 9024, almond ACCESSORIES : Wadding. 1 bauble weighs approx. 12 grams, without wadding. NEEDLES : DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3 MM. DROPS CROCHET HOOK SIZE 3 MM. KNITTING TENSION: 23 stitches in width and 32 rows in height with stocking stitch and Nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE: Needle size is only a guide. If you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. If you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
